tool_description: Retrieves current stock levels and historical inventory data for specified products within a date range from inventory management systems.

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs or IDs to collect data for

start_date.description: Start date for historical data collection

end_date.description: End date for historical data collection

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Product not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in the inventory system.
Date range too large: Historical data requests cannot exceed 2 years.
Empty product list: At least one product ID must be provided.
usage: Provide an array of product IDs and a date range to retrieve current stock levels and historical inventory movements. Use this data as input for demand forecasting and reorder calculations.

current_stock_levels.description: Current stock quantities for each requested product

historical_data.description: Historical inventory movement records as formatted strings

data_quality_score.description: Quality score of retrieved data from 0-100
